About Me

Hello 👋 I'm Elina UI, a UI/UX designer with a creative spirit, much like Eurydice, who moves between the worlds of art and technology.

Short Bio

With a background in 🎭 theater and 💻 IT, and a 👩🏼‍🎨 Master of Arts degree, I approach design as both an emotional journey and a practical craft. I draw on storytelling and imagination to lead users through intuitive, beautifully designed experiences that are both functional and captivating. Just as Eurydice danced between realms, I balance creativity with usability, bringing magic into every interface I design.
